specifications.Finish: Chemical > Wicking Wicking is a textile treatment that enables fabric to draw moisture or sweat away from the skin and help it evaporate quickly. This keeps the wearer cool and fresh.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Do not bleach Tumble dry normal low heat Iron on low heat on reverse side if needed Do not dry clean Performance Cool Touch Cool Touch treatment is a finishing process that gives fabric a cool and refreshing feel. It helps absorb and dissipate heat and moisture quickly, keeping the wearer comfortable and dry in hot conditions. UV Protection A treatment to reduce fabric exposure to UV rays through application of a UV blocking agent that absorbs or scatters UV rays. Breathable Fabric that allows air to pass through easily, helping to keep the wearer cool and comfortable. Quick Dry Quick dry is a technical fabric that wicks away sweat and moisture, helping to maintain a cool and fresh feeling. Brand Yarn MIPAN aqua-XÂ® Recommended Use Activewear, Swimwear
